description.zh-cn: 中华民国早期学者、作家、散文家、副刊编辑，在新闻学上有民国“副刊大王”之称。
description.en: An early Republic of China scholar, writer, essayist, and literary supplement editor, known as the 'King of Supplements' in the history of journalism.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代散文家、文学理论家、评论家、诗人、翻译家、思想家，鲁迅之弟。
description.en: A modern Chinese essayist, literary theorist, critic, poet, translator, and thinker; brother of Lu Xun.

description.zh-cn: 中国画家、美术评论家，孙伏园之弟。
description.en: A Chinese painter and art critic, younger brother of Sun Fuyuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名高等学府。
description.en: A major research university in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 五四运动时期的北京大学学生社团。
description.en: A student society at Peking University during the May Fourth Movement.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初期在北京发行的一份报纸。
description.en: A newspaper published in Beijing during the early Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家，皖系军阀首领。
description.en: A Chinese politician and warlord, leader of the Anhui clique.

description.zh-cn: 指段祺瑞担任中华民国国务总理或临时执政期间的政府。
description.en: Refers to the government during the period when Duan Qirui served as Premier or Provisional Chief Executive of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的一家报纸。
description.en: A newspaper during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代作家、文学评论家、文化活动家和社会活动家。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, literary critic, cultural and social activist.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、诗人、学者、文学评论家、文学史家、翻译家、艺术史家。
description.en: A Chinese writer, poet, scholar, literary critic, literary historian, translator, and art historian.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代文学史上成立最早、影响最大的文学社团之一。
description.en: One of the earliest and most influential literary societies in the history of modern Chinese literature.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义的先驱，中国共产党主要创始人之一。
description.en: A pioneer of Marxism in China and one of the main founders of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、战略家、理论家和诗人，中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary, political theorist, and founding father of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国近现代文学家、思想家、革命家。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, thinker, and revolutionary.

en: The True Story of Ah Q

description.zh-cn: 鲁迅创作的中篇小说。
description.en: A novella written by Lu Xun.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代著名女作家、诗人、翻译家、儿童文学家。
description.en: A famous modern Chinese female writer, poet, translator, and children's author.

description.zh-cn: 冰心创作的散文集。
description.en: A collection of prose by Bing Xin.

description.zh-cn: 周作人的作品。
description.en: A work by Zhou Zuoren.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年的一场思想启蒙和文化革新运动。
description.en: A movement of intellectual and cultural renewal in the early Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任《晨报》代理主编。
description.en: Served as the acting chief editor of 'Chen Bao'.

description.zh-cn: 中国新文化运动时期的文学社团。
description.en: A literary society during the New Culture Movement in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国报人、新闻记者、新闻教育家。
description.en: A Chinese newspaperman, journalist, and journalism educator.

description.zh-cn: 由邵飘萍创办的报纸。
description.en: A newspaper founded by Shao Piaoping.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广州市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A major research university in Guangzhou, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国厦门市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A major research university in Xiamen, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代作家、学者、翻译家、语言学家。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, scholar, translator, and linguist.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的一家报纸。
description.en: A newspaper during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党在不同时期的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Kuomintang (Chinese Nationalist Party) in different periods.

description.zh-cn: 中国现代文学家、历史学家、考古学家、社会活动家。
description.en: A modern Chinese writer, historian, archaeologist, and social activist.

nodes.id: 湖南农民运动考察报告

zh-cn: 湖南农民运动考察报告
en: Report on an Investigation of the Peasant Movement in Hunan

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东为答复当时党内外对农民革命斗争的责难而写的报告。
description.en: A report written by Mao Zedong in response to criticism from within and outside the party regarding the peasant revolutionary struggle.

description.zh-cn: 指南京国民政府和武汉国民政府的合并事件。
description.en: Refers to the merger of the Nanjing Nationalist Government and the Wuhan Nationalist Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国平民教育家和乡村建设家。
description.en: A Chinese mass educator and rural reconstruction pioneer.

description.zh-cn: 由晏阳初等人发起的平民教育团体。
description.en: A mass education organization initiated by Y. C. James Yen and others.

description.zh-cn: 湖南省衡山县的行政管理机关。
description.en: The administrative body of Hengshan County, Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30年代至40年代，中华民国与大日本帝国之间发生的战争。
description.en: A military conflict fought primarily between the Republic of China and the Empire of Japan from the 1930s to the 1940s.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府时期的最高军事统帅机关。
description.en: The supreme military command organ of the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾任重庆《中央日报》社社长。
description.en: Served as the president of the Chongqing 'Central Daily News'.

description.zh-cn: 郭沫若创作的历史剧。
description.en: A historical play written by Guo Moruo.

description.zh-cn: 存在于1910年至1952年的教会大学，位于四川成都。
description.en: A Christian university that existed from 1910 to 1952, located in Chengdu, Sichuan.

description.zh-cn: 存在于1864年至1952年的教会大学，位于山东济南。
description.en: A Christian university that existed from 1864 to 1952, located in Jinan, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国成都市的一所综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A major research university in Chengdu, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一家报纸。
description.en: A newspaper in China.

nodes.id: 中国文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 中国文学艺术界联合会

description.zh-cn: 由中国各文学艺术家人组成的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization composed of various literary and artistic figures in China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国新闻出版总署

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国新闻出版总署

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院负责新闻出版事业的直属机构。
description.en: Formerly a direct subordinate agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for press and publication affairs.

description.zh-cn: 1918年到北京大学旁听，1919年转为正式生，1921年毕业。
description.en: Started as an auditor at Peking University in 1918, became a regular student in 1919, and graduated in 1921.

description.zh-cn: 孙福熙是孙伏园的弟弟。
description.en: Sun Fuxi is Sun Fuyuan's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 经周作人介绍，孙伏园到北京大学旁听。
description.en: Through Zhou Zuoren's introduction, Sun Fuyuan began to audit classes at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 因刊登揭露段祺瑞政府丑闻，《国民公报》被查封。
description.en: 'Guomin Gongbao' was shut down for publishing scandals related to the Duan Qirui government.

description.zh-cn: 与茅盾、郑振铎等人共同发起成立。
description.en: Co-founded with Mao Dun, Zheng Zhenduo, and others.

description.zh-cn: 安排孙伏园任职北大图书馆书记。
description.en: Arranged for Sun Fuyuan to work as a secretary at the Peking University Library.

description.zh-cn: 孙伏园辞去北大图书馆书记职务后，由毛泽东接任。
description.en: After Sun Fuyuan resigned from his post as secretary at the Peking University Library, Mao Zedong took over the position.

description.zh-cn: 在主持《晨报》副刊时发表了鲁迅的《阿Q正传》。
description.en: Published Lu Xun's 'The True Story of Ah Q' while editing the supplement of 'Chen Bao'.

description.zh-cn: 在主持《晨报》副刊时发表了冰心的《寄小读者》。
description.en: Published Bing Xin's 'To Young Readers' while editing the supplement of 'Chen Bao'.

description.zh-cn: 在主持《晨报》副刊时发表了周作人的《自己的园地》。
description.en: Published Zhou Zuoren's 'My Own Garden' while editing the supplement of 'Chen Bao'.

description.zh-cn: 孙伏园主编的《晨报》副刊成为新文化运动的一处宣传阵地。
description.en: The 'Chen Bao' supplement, edited by Sun Fuyuan, became a propaganda platform for the New Culture Movement.

description.zh-cn: 因预备发表鲁迅的诗歌与时任代理主编刘勉发生冲突并辞职。
description.en: Clashed with acting chief editor Liu Mian over the planned publication of a poem by Lu Xun, leading to his resignation.

description.zh-cn: 邀请孙伏园主编《京报副刊》。
description.en: Invited Sun Fuyuan to be the chief editor of the 'Jing Bao' supplement.

description.zh-cn: 作为厦门大学文学院院长，邀请孙伏园赴该校任职。
description.en: As the Dean of the College of Arts at Xiamen University, he invited Sun Fuyuan to join the faculty.

position.en: Secretary of the Institute of Sinology's editorial department

description.zh-cn: 在厦门大学任职期间，与同在该校任教的鲁迅保持密切联系。
description.en: While working at Xiamen University, maintained close contact with Lu Xun, who was also teaching there.

relationships.target: 湖南农民运动考察报告

description.zh-cn: 在汉口《中央日报》副刊上发表了毛泽东的《湖南农民运动考察报告》。
description.en: Published Mao Zedong's 'Report on an Investigation of the Peasant Movement in Hunan' in the Hankou 'Central Daily News' supplement.

description.zh-cn: 宁汉合流后，武汉《中央日报》停刊。
description.en: After the Nanjing-Wuhan Combination, the Wuhan 'Central Daily News' ceased publication.

description.zh-cn: 邀请孙伏园出任中华平民教育促进会文学部主任。
description.en: Invited Sun Fuyuan to serve as the Director of the Literature Department of the China Association for the Advancement of Mass Education.

position.en: Design Committee Member of the Political Department

description.zh-cn: 作为重庆《中央日报》社社长，约请孙伏园主编《中央副刊》。
description.en: As the president of the Chongqing 'Central Daily News', invited Sun Fuyuan to be the chief editor of the 'Central Supplement'.

description.zh-cn: 在《中央副刊》上刊发了郭沫若的历史剧《屈原》。
description.en: Published Guo Moruo's historical play 'Qu Yuan' in the 'Central Supplement'.

description.zh-cn: 孙伏园因刊发历史剧《屈原》而被解聘。
description.en: Sun Fuyuan was dismissed for publishing the historical play 'Qu Yuan'.

position.en: Faculty of the College of Arts
Chief Writer and Chief Editor of Supplement

relationships.target: 中国文学艺术界联合会
中华人民共和国新闻出版总署

position.en: Director of the National Library of Publications
